column2: Who are the teammates in this activity? Write their names. (One submission per team is enough)
column3: Activity 1: Clearly define and write a task that you would want to automate.
column4: Activity 2: What is the final outcome that you expect your system to do? Clearly explain that after giving the instructions, what will be the final output.
column5: Activity 3: Once you have the desired output in mind, state here what are the inputs that you are going to require in order to achieve this output.
column6: Activity 4: State here any arithmetic or conditional operation that you would require to perform on the inputs.
column7: Activity 5: State here clearly, if you would require to repeat any set of instructions.
column8: Activity 6: After all the above set of instructions are followed, what is the final output produced.
